long_description:
Usable in Mintest Game v5.x, Mineclonia, MineClone2 up to v0.80, and more.

I like the REFI Textures except for the weird emphasis on lots of cyan and also green colors where they don't belong, so I seek to remove such things with this one.
So don't take this as a mockery of REFI Textures as that is not my intention, I simply want to adjust some of the textures to my liking.

Some prominent examples of textures that have been changed:
End stone
andesite
dirt
bow
fishing rod
raw food
books
bonemeal
sugar
jack'o lantern
gold
emerald

to-do
clock

This texture pack is provided as is and I don't guarantee any plans for the future. It's kind of a hasty rework as of now, and it's not yet complete but I will be releasing newer versions as I find further textures that I want to change. I'm not looking to get contributions or such from other people.
name: refined_textures
short_description: Attempts to recapture a similar aesthetic to "Minecraft", a fork of REFI_Textures to remove all the weird emphasis on cyan colors.
title: Refined Textures
